sentences.english: The compound has good effect for curing the diarrhea and dysentery.
sentences.chinese: 本组合物治疗泄泻与痢疾具有很好的效果。

sentences.english: It includes a seven-point plan for countries to use to prevent and treat diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 该报告还包含了关于各国防治痢疾的七点计划。

sentences.english: Therefore, amebic dysentery was the predominant cause during this outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 阿米巴痢疾为法定乙类传染病。

sentences.english: She has been debilitated by dysentery.
sentences.chinese: 她让痢疾搞得身体非常虚弱。

sentences.english: It includes a 7-point plan for countries to use to prevent and treat diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 它包括了一份七点计划，让各国用来防治痢疾。

sentences.english: Acute dysentery wracked and sapped life from his body.
sentences.chinese: 急性痢疾严重伤害了他的肌体。

sentences.english: Amebic dysentery is B type infectious disease legally.
sentences.chinese: 阿米巴痢疾为法定乙类传染病。

sentences.english: Iodoquinol and chloroquine are often used to treat amoebic dysentery.
sentences.chinese: 双碘喹啉和氯喹常用于治疗阿米巴痢疾。

sentences.english: Therefore, thinks the meter to retain the sausage treatment chronic bacillary dysentery curative effect affirmation.
sentences.chinese: 因此，思密达保留灌肠治疗慢性细菌性痢疾疗效肯定。

sentences.english: Study on transfering and diffusing of antibiotic resistant plasmid in Shigella spp.
sentences.chinese: 痢疾杆菌耐药性质粒的转移与扩散的研究。

sentences.english: In may , the number of notifications of bacillary dysentery was 5
sentences.chinese: 五月份，杆菌痢疾的呈报个案有5宗。

sentences.english: Bacillary dysentery was more often seen in the outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 肠道传染病暴发病种以细菌性痢疾多见。

sentences.english: Has long been used in folk An Xi Tie Guan Yin treatment of diarrhea and stomach pain practice.
sentences.chinese: 在安溪民间早有采用铁观音治疗痢疾和肚子痛的做法。

sentences.english: Native to China, the bark of Magnolia is being researched as an agent against amoebic dysentery.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，厚朴一直被用来治疗阿米巴痢疾。

sentences.english: The expression of virulence genes of Shigella is temperature-dependent.
sentences.chinese: 痢疾杆菌毒力的表达是温度相关的。

sentences.english: Therefore, amebic dysentery was the predominant cause during this outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 显然地阿米巴痢疾是此次流行的主要原因。

definition: ascariasis/infectation by parasitic roundworm Ascaris lumbricoides
stomatitis/ulceration of oral cavity/inflammation of the mucous lining of the mouth
